title: Updated!  Granite Countertops!  Wood floors! Easy Highway Access!
posting_body: Newly renovated 1 and 2 bedroom apartments are close to great schools, and beautiful parks.
Short drive to UT Arlington, AT&T Stadium, Globe Life Park, and DFW International Airport.
Step outside your door into the center of Arlington with effortless connection to major highways, giving you instant access to all the hottest social scenes, dining, and shopping.
100% FREE SERVICE WITH A LICENSED AGENT!
Pets - Max 2 allowed, 35 Pound Weight Limit, One time Fee $150.00, Rent $10.00
Community Amenities: Carports, Reserved Spaces, Outdoor Grills, Fitness center, Basketball and Sand Volleyball Courts, Perimeter fence, Bark Park, Playground, Three Sparkling Pools

Unit Amenities: Premium Countertops, Dishwashers, Storage closet outside, Microwaves, New Black Appliances, Ice makers, Miniblinds, Hi-speed internet, Hardwood Floors, Cable ready, Laundry Room Onsite, Private patios/balconies, Fireplaces, Intrusion Alarms
Desiree Galloway| Real Estate Agent | DASH Realty
Please contact me directly to schedule an appointment.
Prices and specials change daily, contact me for availability.
All units do not have the advertised features or amenities.
